product_name: Royal Robbins Soma Fleece Vest - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: What's not to love about the Royal Robbins Soma vest? Its polyester/rayon fleece is oh-so soft and warm, and it looks great with its rich, textured surface and subtle two-tone pattern. Fleece interior is brushed for great warmth and comfort. Snap close hand pockets; two-way front zipper; brushed fleece collar. Royal Robbins Soma vest has a regular fit.
short_description: What's not to love about the Royal Robbins Soma vest? Its polyester/rayon fleece is oh-so soft and warm, and it looks great with its rich, textured surface and subtle two-tone pattern.
